verses.text: God \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* refuge \w and|strong="H1121"\w* strength, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* very present help \w in|strong="H5921"\w* trouble.

\w So|strong="H3966"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H4672"\w* fear, though earth should change, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* hills totter \w into|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* heart \w of|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* ocean.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* waters roar \w and|strong="H2022"\w* foam, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w shake|strong="H4131"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* swelling thereof. \w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w side|strong="H3220"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* hosts, \w our|strong="H5921"\w* sure defence \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Jacob. \qs Selah\qs*

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* river \w there|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w*, whose streams \w make|strong="H1993"\w* glad God’s city, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* home \w the|strong="H2022"\w* Most High has hallowed.

God \w is|strong="H5892"\w* within her: \w she|strong="H5892"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H5892"\w* shaken. God helps her \w at|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* turn \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* morning.
Nations roared, kingdoms \w tottered|strong="H4131"\w*: \w he|strong="H1242"\w* uttered \w his|strong="H7130"\w* voice, earth melted \w away|strong="H6437"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* side \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* hosts, \w our|strong="H5414"\w* sure defence \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Jacob.

\w Come|strong="H6635"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* see what \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* done, working appallingly \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* stills wars \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth – breaking \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bow, snapping \w the|strong="H3068"\w* spear, burning \w the|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire.

‘Refrain; \w and|strong="H7198"\w* know surely \w that|strong="H4421"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* am God, high \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* nations, high \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* world.’

\w On|strong="H3045"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* side \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Hosts, \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* defence \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Jacob. \qs Selah\qs*
